Text: Re Fetzer Vineyards and renewable power Cc Aaron Could you provide me with the monthly spend for both gas and electric on this account I am assuming you have the gas spend We will make a determination from there Dick I know you have been trying to reach me about the other renewable opportunity we discussed a couple of weeks ago however I just dont have the resources at this time to work that opportunity Please feel free to work the opportunity with your contact in Portland I apologize for the delayed response Aaron please get back to me with whatever information you may have on Fetzer Regards Lamar From Aaron KlemmWestern RegionThe Bentley xchange on PM To Lamar ES cc Tom RileyWestern RegionThe Bentley xchange xchange Subject Fetzer Vineyards and renewable power Richard and Lamar Fetzer emailed me recently and wants to begin discussions on extending their fixed price renewable power deal with us Their current fixed price expires in with and index price going out to If this is below your radar Lamar I would be happy to work it with the customer and Richard on the renewable energy side Aaron Klemm Service Management
